acf.module_long_description: The SUSO Method is not just designed for marketers who want to take their SEO skill set to the next level, but also for entrepreneurs, CEOs, CTOs, tech savvy computer scientists and developers, data analysts and intelligent marketers who want to know the ins and outs of Google’s Algorithm.
acf.content:
There are countless SEO courses around, many of which simply tell you how to be a good SEO.

At SUSO, we believe the why is just as important, because without the why, we believe the how can never truly be appreciated.

If you approach organic search from Google’s perspective, rather than how an SEO thinks, you’ll be at a much greater advantage.

In fact, it’s part of our mission statement:

We execute detailed & results driven, technical SEO strategies that are based upon a set of focused core principles: Never Assume. Analyse & Measure. Think Critically. Be Curious. Stay Committed. Always Empathise. Inspire.

We wanted to bring this same philosophy by creating an advanced SEO course that delves deep into topics that focus not only on the theory of SEO, but is carefully designed to give an insight into the why.

For example, we know links are one of the core ranking signals Google’s algorithm looks at, but why?

This course is not just designed for marketers who want to take their online presence and SEO skill set to the next level, but also for entrepreneurs, CEOs, CTOs, tech savvy computer scientists and developers, data analysts and intelligent marketers who want to know the ins and outs of Google’s Algorithm.

Each module in The SUSO Method: An Advanced SEO Textbook is structured in a way that details the core concepts of SEO and shows you our own renowned methods of tackling them.

We’ve also included an interactive quiz at the end of each module to test your knowledge.

We are SUSO. We live SEO
